message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I know you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $10,000 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.
